casebody.data:
FLORIDA COSTAL THEATRES, INC. v. SARA BELFLOWER, Joined by her husband, CARL BELFLOWER, and CARL BELFLOWER. 37 So. (2nd) 508 November 30, 1948

June Term, 1948

En Banc *967Harry T. Gray, Marks, Gray, Yates & Conroy, for appellant. Laura H. Hyde, for appellees. PER CURIAM:

The evidence is found sufficient to support the verdict and no error of law found in the trial, the judgment is affirmed. See Florida Costal Theatres, Inc., v. Belflower, et al, 159 Fla. 741, 32 So. 2nd 738 for former appearance of this case.

TERRELL, ADAMS, SEBRING BARNS and HOBSON, JJ., concur. THOMAS, C. J., and CHAPMAN, J., dissents.
